task_name: 1. Study recap and CP with Owners and Time / Voyage Charterers. Save both recaps and CPs in the "Recaps & Documents folder" in the Cash flow program. Make a copy to the same folder on your Memory Stick
2. Check in cp the option for on-hire bunker/condition survey, where is better to arrange - delivery port or first load port? __________________ name of co __________
3. Obtain all up to date main certificates of the vessel via Master/owners
4. Check the preliminary Bunker program for the voyage. Is it necessary to supply prior delivery
5. Update cash flow 2 times a week
1. Send greeting message asking broker in charge full contact details of vessel; check the vessel's email attachment limit
2. Obtain details of agents at the delivery port (if available)
3. Agree with owners of the on-hire surveyor company and cost share
4. Study when Redelivery notices to be tendered and save the schedule in your records
1. Greeting message with Company «N» quest-re, BROB table and initial voyage instructions
2. Ensure Master & Owners are giving regular daily estimated time of delivery notices to Company «N»
1. Send a greeting message asking the broker in charge of full contact details
2. Check in recap lay can and if best operational speed suits
3. Give initial ETA load port notice to Voyage Charterers
4. Ask for final Load port and Agents' details if not stated in recap. Keep asking until received
1. Check vessel's prospects via owners' agents at delivery place
2. Check if there are Canals on the route to load port
3. Nominate agents at load port in advance
4. Check if there are any specific schedule, convoys and restrictions for passage
1. Nominate surveyors for on-hire bunker / + condition survey (compulsory for period vessels including detailed photo report of holds' condition). Inform Master about arrangements
2. Add line in cash flow for payment to surveyor
1. Check the routing clause in cp. Appoint a routing company for ballast trip
1. Declare vessel in P and
1. Calculate first hire and pay timely w/I recap/cp agreed time bar (_____ days)
2. Bank details to be verified with the owners' broker verbally prior payment. Beneficiary should be in accordance with agreed recap terms
1. Check delivery notice from Master (BROB, position, time)
1. Calculate Optimal bunkering program taking into account Weather conditions and Seca areas on the route, port consumption
2. Request and check Master's Pre stowage plan. If needed discuss to minimize: fresh water, unpumpable ballast (as per last draft survey), constant and maximize cargo intake
3. Update cash flow 2 times a week. On ________ and _______
4. Check if it is reasonable to sail at ECO or full speed due to lay can, congestion. ________
1. Check with Master your bunker plan figures. Discuss ways to increase the max intake if possible
2. Request Pre Stowage plan & give full cargo, bunker, load port, discharge port details & restrictions
3. Timely in advance give Master particular LP NOR instructions for your voyage
1. Check with Master your bunker plan figures. Discuss ways to increase the max intake if possible
2. Request Pre Stowage plan & give full cargo, bunker, load port, discharge port details & restrictions
3. Timely in advance give Master particular LP NOR instructions for your voyage
1. Agreed pre-stow plan with maximum intake to be passed timely to Charterers for info / approval with Company «N» standard remark (whatever appropriate)
2. Daily eta notices to be tendered to all required parties as per recap/cp/Voyage charterers' request
